>>>>How do I ver=
ify that command line arguments are

ivate member variables?

e variables but

s.

>   to=
 access these variables. But it is worse solution than testing

r.

This last suggestion is good to get tests passing. Refactor the needs f=
or those methods away once the tests pass.
